headline.main: The Next Abortion Case Is Here

docs.abstract: An appeal in Oklahoma has drawn little attention, but at issue is the Supreme Court’s own unstable abortion doctrine.
docs.snippet: An appeal in Oklahoma has drawn little attention, but at issue is the Supreme Court’s own unstable abortion doctrine.

docs.lead_paragraph: The deaths, at Electric Zoo on Randalls Island, were consistent with use of the drug Ecstasy, according to the mayor’s office, which recommended the event be called off.

headline.main: Weekend Revelry Cut Short After 2 Die at Electronic Music Festival
headline.print_headline: Weekend Revelry Abruptly Ends After 2 Die at Electronic Music Festival

docs.abstract: Electric Zoo, multi-day electronic music festival that draws tens of thousands of people to Randalls Island over Labor Day weekend, is canceled on its last day after city officials say two concertgoers had died and at least four others had fallen critically ill; deaths appear to be consistent with use of drug MDMA, also known as Ecstasy or molly.
docs.snippet: The deaths, at Electric Zoo on Randalls Island, were consistent with use of the drug Ecstasy, according to the mayor’s office, which recommended the event be called off.

byline.original: By VIVIAN YEE and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM
